text: Adventurer's Park is a small amusement park in the Bensonhurst section of Brooklyn in New York City. It is a concession located within the city-owned Nellie Bly Park, next to the Belt Parkway.Nellie Bly Park, New York City Department of Parks and Recreation, Retrieved October 20, 2019 The concession, also originally named Nellie Bly Park, features classic kiddie rides and arcade games as well as a Ferris wheel, go carts and miniature golf. ==References== Category:Amusement parks in New York (state) Category:Bensonhurst, Brooklyn Category:Parks in Brooklyn
